flawed_nl_solution:
He needs to save up $100 because 14600 - 14500 = <<14600-14500=1000>>1000
He earned $60 off trips because 40 x 1.5 = <<40*1.5=60>>60
He earned $40 off groceries because 1000 - 60 = <<1000-60=940>>940
He delivered $800 in groceries because 940 / 0.05 = <<940/0.05=18800>>18800
#### 18800

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
